message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a unique product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to you as well. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000.  Please let me know your decision, as I have another interested buyer ready to purchase it for $800000.
